Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 11 Ācayagāmittika » 11.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 11.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 11.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
Ācayagāmittika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
40.
1549Ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
1550Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
<< 11.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Naadhipatyādi >>
